title: Consistent Lag Ever Since 5.24 patch 300-500ms
body: Ever since this patch i've had consistent 300-500ms i play on the OCE server so I'm usually around 80-90ms but ever since i installed 5.24 i've had lag every game. sometimes its fine and goes to around 100-110 then right back up to 300-500 man i can't play with this :(( has anyone found a fix? i've done a speed test and it shows my ms to be around 80, although while in the game im sitting at 350ms :/ if anyone could help me out would mean alot! thanks.

replies.body:
Hi,

Where do you play from and what ISP are you with?

First step would be to check over the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article and make sure you're all set up correctly.

You can also do a [traceroute](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) to the OCE servers and see what your path to the servers looks like.

Let me know how you go.

Mindstar
I play From W.A, ISP is Telstra. Currently doing the traceroute. i've completed the traceroute, would you like the txt doc?
You can copy and paste the results here :)
